name: Santa: Christmas Eve
description:
Small christmas game about Santa work. You have to collect gifts and deliver them under the christmas trees. Job like every year.

Fly your magic sleigh and don't let too many presents be stolen!
The evil elf has enchanted the children and they are now hunting Santa!

Requirements
Reccomended:
GTX 1070/ GTX 1060, CPU ~Ryzen 2600x
Minimum:
GTX 650 / I7 2600
Also should work on laptop with integrated graphics card like vega or intel iris.

Controls:
WSAD and mouse to fly (you can change control in menu)
Press "E" to getting out of the sleigh

How to play:
Explode the bomb and then collect the gift that falls out of it.
Christmas tree need 6 gifts to pass the house.

Newest update:

- new christmas tree animation
- fixed bug (kicked off the map when getting out of the sleigh)
- fixed bug (can't deliver gifts)
